namespace {{ namespacename }};

public class Get{{ modelnameplural }}CountQuery : IRequest<int>
{
}

public class Get{{ modelnameplural }}CountQueryHandler : IRequestHandler<Get{{ modelnameplural }}CountQuery, int>
{
    private readonly IApplicationDbContext _context;

    public Get{{ modelnameplural }}CountQueryHandler(IApplicationDbContext context)
    {
        _context = context;
    }

    public Task<int> Handle(Get{{ modelnameplural }}CountQuery request, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
    {
        int totalCount = _context.{{ modelnameplural }}.Count();
        return Task.FromResult(totalCount);
    }
}
